item.title: Money Partner Group Latest to Invest in Bitcoin Exchange Kraken
item.description:
Money Partner Group Latest to Invest in Bitcoin Exchange Kraken

The Tokyo-based company, which reportedly holds a market cap of over $USD260 million, confirmed its plans to further its business portfolio in digital currency sector, starting by offering Bitcoin trading and settlement services to its clients. Money Partners Group, one of the Japan's leading forex brokerage firms, has taken its first steps into the Bitcoin industry following an investment into Kraken.

item.title: What a Tech Startup's Pivots Say About Bitcoin's Future
item.description:
What a Tech Startup's Pivots Say About Bitcoin's Future

Those who want to understand exactly how bitcoin is being adopted in the U.S. would do well to take a look at tech startup Snapcard. The company has existed less than three years, but it's already reinvented itself twice, changing its business model to adjust to bitcoin's evolution.

item.title: The Latest Ethminer 0.9.41-genoil-1.0.7 Beta for Windows
item.description:
The Latest Ethminer 0.9.41-genoil-1.0.7 Beta for Windows

We have compiled a Windows binary (64-bit only) from the latest ethminer 0.9.41 Genoil fork 1.0.7 beta for Nvidia CUDA as well as AMD OpenCL mining of Ethereum ( source). The latest code comes with the addition of failover support for Stratum mode along with the already available in previous release failover support for the standard mining mode.

item.title: Spend Bitcoin Online | Bitcoin.com
item.description:
Spend Bitcoin Online | Bitcoin.com

Buy Bitcoin, Create Bitcoin Wallets, Read Bitcoin News, and more, at Bitcoin.com

item.title: Has Bitcoin become the new ransom money?
item.description:
Has Bitcoin become the new ransom money?

When an Information Technology (IT) company in Mysuru recently became the target of a 'denial-of-service' attack, the attackers demanded Bitcoins in return for sharing the key to restore the company's computer systems. The attackers demanded management Bitcoins - virtual money through Bitcoin-dealing websites - in return for the key.

item.title: Cost of running Bitcore
item.description:
Cost of running Bitcore

What's the cost of running Bitcore on AWS or DigitalOcean? I know I'd need about 128gb of hardrive space, but I'm not sure how much the typical bandwidth costs would be, and how much RAM or cores I...

item.title: Alleged SA Ponzi 'Bitcoin-based MMM Global' goes bust - Russian founder hiding - BizNews.com
item.description:
Alleged SA Ponzi 'Bitcoin-based MMM Global' goes bust - Russian founder hiding - BizNews.com

The writing was on the wall, but sometimes the allure of unrealistic returns gets the better of people. The Belvedere Ponzi scandal expose' should have acted as a stark warning two years ago. But in September last year Russian-based MMM Global was listed as a potential pyramid scheme by the National Consumer Commission of South Africa, offering 30 percent returns.

item.title: Estonian Supreme Court Rules Against Bitcoin Trader - CoinDesk
item.description:
Estonian Supreme Court Rules Against Bitcoin Trader - CoinDesk

The Estonian Supreme Court has ruled in favor of restrictions on bitcoin trading activity in the wake of a lawsuit filed by a digital currency broker. The ruling, which came in the wake of a long-running lawsuit that began as a inquiry into the legality of bitcoin, means that traders buyers face new barriers for dealing in digital currencies in the European state.

item.title: A Bitcoiner Turned $100 Bills into Bitcoin Paper Wallets
item.description:
A Bitcoiner Turned $100 Bills into Bitcoin Paper Wallets

Bitcoiners have a knack for rebellion. They champion above all else the decentralized nature of Bitcoin, and how it can't be controlled by a central bank or other centralized entity. They can carry an aversion to banks - private or public - and governments, as well.

item.title: Ethereum: the competitor to Bitcoin which could transform entire industries
item.description:
Ethereum: the competitor to Bitcoin which could transform entire industries

A young woman with long, lank hair appears on a deserted suburban street. She stumbles, and collapses. A young woman with long, lank hair and no shoes steps outside, tentatively, closing a door behind her. She pauses at the gate onto the suburban street, before breaking into a run.
